smapsActiveEntity.msgText: 302107Z OCT 25 HYDROARC 195/25(GEN). ADDITIONAL MILITARY LAYERS (AML) ADVISORY. 1. USERS OF NGA AML PRODUCTS ARE ADVISED OF UNINTENDED ECDIS BEHAVIOR WHEN QUERYING AREA OBJECTS WITHIN EDITION 2 OF THE BOUNDARIES AML (U4R0UMBA THROUGH U4R0UMBZ) ONLY. EDITION 1 OF THE BOUNDARIES AML, OPAREA AMLS (U4R0UOA1, U4R0UOA3, U4R0UOA0) AND HITS AML (U4R0UHIT) ARE NOT AFFECTED. NGA HAS CONFIRMED THIS ISSUE AFFECTS NAVY VMS 9.5.2; OTHER SYSTEMS ARE CURRENTLY UNASSESSED. QUERYING AREA OBJECTS OF THE BOUNDARIES AML WILL CAUSE THE ECDIS TO LOCK UP AND SHUT DOWN AFTER USER ACKNOWLEDGEMENT. NGA RECOMMENDS REMOVING BOUNDARIES AML EDITION 2 LAYERS FROM THE CHART INDEX AND USING EDITION 1. KEEPING THE EDITION 2 FILES WITHIN THE EMERGENCY NAVIGATION LAPTOP CREATES THE POTENTIAL FOR A USER TO QUERY A BOUNDARIES AML AREA OBJECT AND CRASH THE VMS UNIT WHILE UNDERWAY REQUIRING A SOFTWARE RESTART. 2. FOR QUESTIONS OR CONCERNS, CONTACT MARHELP@NGA.MIL.

241504Z OCT 25 HYDROARC 190/25(GEN). 1. HYDROARC WARNINGS IN FORCE AS OF 241503Z OCT. ALL THE INFORCE WARNINGS ARE LISTED HERE. 180/2025, 178/2025, 175/2025, 163/2025, 162/2025, 153/2025, 148/2025, 145/2025, 143/2025, 119/2025, 103/2025. 283/2024. 163/2023. 198/2022. 2. THE COMPLETE TEXT OF ALL IN-FORCE HYDROARC BROADCAST WARNINGS ARE AVAILABLE ON THE NGA MARITIME SAFETY INFORMATION WEBSITE AT: MSI.NGA.MIL/NAVWARNINGS. ALTERNATIVELY, THESE MAY BE REQUESTED BY E-MAIL FROM NGA AT NAVSAFETY@NGA.MIL. 3. CANCEL HYDROARC 186/25.

171751Z JUL 25 HYDROARC 103/25. CANCELLED ELECTRONIC NAVIGATIONAL CHART (ENC) ADVISORY. USERS OF NGA ENC PRODUCTS ARE ADVISED OF POTENTIAL UNINTENDED ECDIS BEHAVIOR WHEN PROCESSING CANCELLED CHARTS, INCLUDING REINSTALLATION OF RECENTLY CANCELLED CHARTS ON SOME SYSTEMS WITHOUT OBVIOUS ERROR OR WARNING MESSAGES. NGA HAS CONFIRMED THIS ISSUE AFFECTS NAVY VMS 9.5 AND RAYTHEON ANSCHUTZ SYNAPSIS NX SYSTEMS. THIS ISSUE DOES NOT AFFECT NAVY ECDIS. OTHER SYSTEMS ARE CURRENTLY UNASSESSED. USERS MAY REFERENCE NGAS ENC CATALOG (GLOBAL OR REGIONAL PRODUCT LISTINGS) FOR A LIST OF CANCELLED CHARTS WHICH SHOULD BE UNINSTALLED FROM ECDIS. NGAS GLOBAL ENC CATALOG IS AVAILABLE ON HTTPS://MCDP.NGA.MIL, WITH REGIONAL ENC PRODUCT LISTING SPREADSHEETS CONTAINED WITHIN EACH REGIONS ZIP ON ESYNC, NGAS WEBSITES, AND WORLDCOVER DVD. USERS MAY FILTER PRODUCT LISTINGS FOR EDITION OF CXL AND SORT BY ISSUE DATE TO SEE MOST RECENT CANCELLATIONS. CHARTS CANCELLED WITHIN THE LAST 90 DAYS ARE ACTIVELY DISSEMINATED BY NGA AND MOST LIKELY CANDIDATES FOR INADVERTENT REINSTALLATION. NGA IS CONSULTING WITH THE USER COMMUNITY TO ASSESS POSSIBLE CHANGES TO THE CANCELLED CHART DISSEMINATION PROCESS TO MITIGATE THIS POTENTIAL UNINTENDED ECDIS BEHAVIOR.
